channel.title: Neon Sword for NeonScape Tutorial?
channel.description:
Hello all.
A few friends and I have recently started on a new server called NeonScape, and we're trying to get a sword called the Neon Sword which is supposed to be the strongest in the game. So I was wondering if someone could help me out here with a quick tutorial?
Thanks, Aaron

item.title: Neon Sword for NeonScape Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @Cramer Cramer
item.description:
@Cramer wrote:

Well, I made this through Wings 3D, so maybe if someone could code it for me or something, it would be greatly appreciated. This is my first 3D model ever! So, please, don’t be too hard with your criticism.


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2009, 05:17:22 pm[/size][hr]update**

Read full topic

item.title: Neon Sword for NeonScape Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

go to the models board. there is a tut on how to add a model into your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Neon Sword for NeonScape Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @Cramer Cramer
item.description:
@Cramer wrote:

It is, I came up with the name and stats I want for it, I just can’t figure out how to add it. That’s why I need a tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Neon Sword for NeonScape Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

dude, iv never heard of this sword being coded into a server unless its a model wepon. if you want this wepon then its probabily a custom item which you need to add the ints to your client and model then change the stats for it.

Read full topic
